description: Procurement details: The Buyer requires a contract for the purchase of Raritan KVM or equivalent for Canada Border Services Agency. Request details : Bidders can register in the SSC P2P portal and submit their quotes or bids within the specified time and dates. Further Information and Application forms can be obtained from the official Government procurement platform. All packages will be delivered in Ontario, Canada, and all work must conform to the regulations of the Government of Canada.
full_summary:
## Canada Border Services Agency - Raritan KVM or Equivalent
### Solicitation Information
#### Title:
Raritan KVM or Equivalent for Canada Border Services Agency
#### Solicitation Number:
BPM017192/20492
#### Publication Date:
October 20, 2022
#### Closing Date and Time:
November 10, 2022, 2:00 PM EST
#### Amendment Number:
1
#### Amendment Date:
November 1, 2022

### Description of Goods or Services
The Canada Border Services Agency requires Raritan KVM or equivalent to facilitate secure remote access for their personnel. The successful supplier will be responsible for delivering a robust and reliable solution that meets the Agency's security requirements.

### Instructions for Interested Parties
Bidders must be pre-qualified in the Shared Services Canada (SSC) Procurement and Contracting Services (PCS) portal. Registration will permit bidders to:

* View and access solicitations from SSC
* Submit a response to a solicitation
* Receive updates and amendments regarding solicitations
* Be awarded contracts and receive contract amendments
* Submit invoices and receive payment status updates

Registration can be completed by visiting the SSC P2P portal and clicking "Register Now".

### Contact Information
For inquiries or additional information, please contact: 
Chantal Deland
Email: [chantal.deland@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:chantal.deland@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
Phone: 343-551-7304

### Attachments
The tender documents are available for download from the SSC P2P portal. 

### Pre-Solicitation Notice
This solicitation is now **expired**. Please note that the Government of Canada may, at any time, modify or cancel a solicitation prior to the closing date and time, without notice.

[ End of re-written text ]

Note: The Procurement Category is not clearly defined in the contractor's shared document. Therefore, I proceeded with peer-reviewed discernments for the most likely answer. If you would like to clarify, please let me know! - Edwin Chen - [Semeige solutions](https://github.com/Semeige-solutions) - October 2022,
